title: Handle a Backordered Item on an Order
description: A customer places an order for an item that is currently out of stock. An agent must manage the backorder.

tasks.description: The system automatically flags the order line item as backordered.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is placed on hold pending stock arrival.

tasks.description: Notify the customer of the backorder and provide the estimated in-stock date.
tasks.expected_outcome: An automated email is sent to the customer with the backorder information.

tasks.description: When the item arrives from the supplier, automatically release the backorder for fulfillment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system allocates the new stock to the backorder and sends it to the warehouse for picking.
